bibl.title: On the Aureliate of Clergy and Monks.
bibl.note: Scrutinizes texts presenting the combination of a name beginning in AÈrhl- or Flaoui- + [clerical function: énagn≈sthw; érxidiãkonow, érxipresbÊterow, érximandr€thw; diãkvn, (Ípo)diãkonow; presbÊterow; monaxÒw, monaxÆ, monãzvn, monãzousa]. - Pp. 151-152: Appendix: Attestations of presbÊterow uﬂÒw in documents from Byzantine Egypt. <anagnostes, archidiakonos, archipresbuteros, archimandrites, diakon, (hupo)diakonos, presbuteros, monachos, monache, monazon, monazousa, presbuteros huios>
bibl.seg: WORP K.A., On the Aureliate of Clergy and Monks.
